comment.author: 63061856@N00
comment._content: I don't know if it's just a myth or the truth, but they say that the second tower was not completed because the builders did not have enough money, so they had to leave something out. :-)

comment.author: 66745221@N00
comment._content:
Particular the prospect of  photo! Probably the photo was taken from the Palazzo Cicala historic building that dates from the mid-sixteenth century.
Since the late nineteenth century, the palace was turned into offices, the first by a major insurance company, Italia Assicurazioni, and then by a forwarding company, the Odino Valperga.

Particolare la prospettiva di scatto! Probabilmente la foto è stata scattata da Palazzo Cicala storico palazzo che risale alla metà del Cinquecento.
Dalla fine dell'Ottocento, il palazzo fu adibito a uffici, prima da un'importante compagnia di assicurazioni, l'Italia assicurazioni, e poi da una casa di spedizioni, l'Odino Valperga.
